## WidgetDiv.hideIfOwner() function

Destroy the widget and hide the div if it is being used by the specified object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hideIfOwner(oldOwner: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldOwner | any | The object that was using this container.  Blockly.WidgetDiv.hideIfOwner |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
